name: Cube Adventures (TVBotPC)
description:
The Blue Cube is trying to get all 10 golden cubes to become god but he is being challenged by the other cubes 

Hey so this is my first time making a game before and I am a bit nervous on what people will think of the game and when you play game if you do I might have these questions that I will answer

Q: Why is there no music

A: I have no experiences on making music and I will rather have no music then having bad music and the Sound Effects you hear in this game is using a program called sfxr

Q: Why Cubes?

A:Well Like I said this is my first time making a game and I did not want to go overboard so to make my first game easier I decided cubes will be the best way

Q: Where can we give you feedback

A: You can the itch.io comments on this page or send me gmail via tvbotfeedback@gmail.com any feedback will be appreciated

Q: What platforms are planing on bringing on 

A: I am planning on Releasing this game on Windows, MacOS and Linux and later on Mobile with Ads (still thinking if its a good idea or not) but right now I am really tired and just going to upload the Windows version

Well thats it I hope you guys can enjoy the game anyways am tired and I will be going to sleep 

Bye!
